item.description:
Although we are on Base leg with this, I thought we should get better understanding of who, what,when and where.

Please sign up as Pilots, Co Pilots, Workers/packers.

Items needed are winter coats, jackets, flashlights with batteries, pet food, waters, food with can openers. Please bring all donations to the FCA Flight Center today, Saturday November 3rd only.

Planes will be departing from KFIT for KFRG sporadically between 8:30 a.m. - 10:30 a.m.

There will be a VIP TFR between 9:00 - 12:30 tomorrow. Please file VFR flight plans BEFORE departure AND SQUAWK AND TALK before you leave the ground!

Thanks to all the incredible FPA members that made us a helpful resource during Hurricane Sandy's devastating aftermath. Could have easily been us!

 

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Hurricane Sandy Relief Flights
